channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-5585] Flaky test: Python regression
item.description:
Hey davies any chance you can take a look at this? The master build is having random python failures fairly often. Not quite sure what is going on:

0inputs+128outputs (0major+13320minor)pagefaults 0swaps
Run mllib tests ...

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: pwendell I can not reproduce it locally, will add a seed for it, test it several times in jenkins.

User 'davies' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/4358

Issue resolved by pull request 4358
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/4358
